title: Introduction to C Programming
paragraph: Kickstart your programming journey with the fundamentals of the C programming language. Learn about variables, loops, and functions.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
paragraph: Delve into the world of algorithms and problem-solving. Understand sorting, searching, and algorithmic complexity.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
paragraph: Learn C++ with a focus on data structures and algorithms. Implement key data structures and solve algorithmic challenges.

title: Basic Data Structures
paragraph: Master the essential data structures used in programming, including arrays, linked lists, and trees.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
paragraph: Explore the principles of object-oriented programming (OOP) using Python. Create classes and objects to build software.

title: Software Engineering
paragraph: Gain insights into the software development lifecycle, from requirements analysis to testing and maintenance.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
paragraph: Learn cloud computing with AWS. Explore services like EC2, S3, and Lambda to deploy scalable applications.

title: Database with MySQL
paragraph: Learn database management using MySQL. Design schemas, write SQL queries, and manage database systems.

title: Problem-Solving Part
paragraph: Enhance your problem-solving skills with this course. Learn strategies to tackle complex coding challenges.
